See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

RobotImpl

public RobotImpl(String name,
                 int delay)
Creates a new robot player with the given name and move delay. The robot will start moving after a delay, and then will repeatedly schedule a new move action every delay milliseconds.

Parameters:
name - the name of the robot
delay - the scheduled delay in between robot actions

isServerSide

public boolean isServerSide()
Returns whether or not this player is controlled by a human or by a server side robot.

Specified by:

Overrides:

Returns:
